Text.Page:
We're still mopping up Scions down in the bastion and could use some help, .

Head into the bastion and kill {@LinkCreature:487#1001#devan assassins}, {@LinkCreature:487#1002#shamans}, {@LinkCreature:487#1003#butchers}, and {@LinkCreature:487#1004#bodyguards}.

Report back to me when you're done.
Great to work with you again. You're an incredible soldier.
The sooner you get down there, the sooner the Scions stop breathing.
